about.title: About NR-GEO
about.heading: Slovak Construction Intelligence
about.description: NR-GEO Slovakia is a leading engineering surveying company specializing in underground construction, tunneling, and precision geodesy. With extensive experience, we deliver world-class solutions for Europe's most demanding projects.
about.missionText: To provide precise, reliable geodetic support for critical infrastructure with emphasis on sustainable practices and European quality standards.
